A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really didn't like this movie. It focused too much on subverting Star Wars tropes\, and ended up being a bit of a mess. I do have to say that I recommend people see it for themselves before judging\, but there's a lot to be disappointed in. Without going into too many plot details\, an arc could've been totally cut out\, a character could've died\, another character had no redeeming qualities whatsoever until they died\, and the tone felt very light for a movie where most of the Resistance dies. Other characters were very well done though\, so it's not like I hated everything. Beautifully shot as well. Definitely at the bottom of my favorite Star Wars movies\, and I don't wish to see it again.
